title: Spurious comma causes parse to succeed
body:
by **cnehren**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Break a function's single argument over multiple lines
2. Omit the unnecessary comma
3. Receive an error message: prog.go:7: syntax error: unexpected semicolon or newline,
expecting )



What is the expected output?
Program compiles and runs

What do you see instead?
prog.go:7: syntax error: unexpected semicolon or newline, expecting )

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
Whatever's on play.golang.org

Which operating system are you using?
Whatever's on play.golang.org

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
Whatever's on play.golang.org

Please provide any additional information below.
Broken code: http://play.golang.org/p/_ZD9ZovVCV
Working code: http://play.golang.org/p/Fy7lUPUNQG
